name: Fidget - Quick & Dirty
description:
This is an One-Click/One-Tap jump’n’run game. You can tap, click or press space to jump. Nothing more to do. Just make your way through the short but soon very hard levels. And if you feel strong enough: collect all diamonds.

But… most likely you will DIE! Again and again! ;)

Features: - 44 levels of pure action - 3 worlds (mountains, ice & snow, jungle) - online hiscore - a cat as hero (who could resist that!?) - blood! ;)

Current progress is saved after each level!

Update 1.09:
Fixed online hiscore.
